title: Why interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS' close Earth approach is an early Christmas gift for astronomers
description: When 3I/ATLAS is closest to the Earth on Dec. 19, all the features that we are looking for will be easier to detect with our telescopes.
content: When 3I/ATLAS is closest to the Earth on Dec. 19, all the features that we are looking for will be easier to detect with our telescopes.
